name: Smart Pocket
description: $SP is the base currency of Smart Pocket. It connects once-scattered IP token economies into one. Every token issued on MemePad ends its contract address with the shared “SP” tag. It signals clear membership in Smart Pocket and a direct link to $SP—reinforcing legitimacy and brand unity. The fragmentation problem—thin liquidity, inconvenient swaps, isolated economies. Anchoring to $SP solves it all at once. Through $SP, each token gains interchangeability and shared liquidity. Value circulates across the ecosystem, and users move seamlessly among multiple IP economies on one platform. Believe in $SP. Believe in IP.
